name: @eduvault/server
description: The server includes the backend api, the main app, and the homepage

scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:api
scripts.build:start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start:production: git pull && npm run inst && npm run build:start
scripts.dev-certs:ci: rm -rf deploy/dev-certs; mkdir deploy/dev-certs; cd deploy/dev-certs && make-cert localhost && cd ../../ && rm -rf deploy/prod-certs; mkdir deploy/prod-certs; cd deploy/prod-certs && make-cert localhost
scripts.dev-certs:local: rm -rf deploy/dev-certs; mkdir deploy/dev-certs; cd deploy/dev-certs && mkcert localhost && cp localhost-key.pem key.pem && cp localhost.pem cert.pem && cd ../../ && rm -rf deploy/prod-certs; mkdir deploy/prod-certs; cd deploy/prod-certs && mkcert localhost && cp localhost-key.pem key.pem && cp localhost.pem cert.pem
scripts.inst: npm install && npm run inst:api && npm run inst:app
